title: Deployment
description: Deploying a Nuxt 3 application to Netlify is a breeze. Just a few clicks and you are done. I wish I could give a few comments, but there is just nothing to say. It is that easy. Same goes for Vercel. And yet just a few clicks and this blog is successfully deployed to AWS with Amplify.

title: Configure Alpine
description: Learn how to configure Alpine with the app.config.ts file.
